about_the_game:
Here is a game that will change the world of gaming! 💨💚


A game that tells a touching and twisting story as old as the world. A story that applies to both the poor and the rich. Women and men. Religious and secular people. Persons wise and foolish. Persons happy and sad. A story about farting!

Here's a simple life simulator where you click and fart, but also more than that! You can get as many as 100 achievements here - both available in the game itself and on Steam. 💨

Click, fart, discover characters and new stories! 😂

Find out if this game really has an end! 👀

📌 Play and


  • Unlock 100 achievements!
  • Discover all the heroes!
  • Take part in a clever and touching story!
  • Share your thoughts about existence with other players!
  • Fart and burp freely - that's what it's all about after all! 💚

👉 Meet the main character of my latest game A Story About Farting. Ahead of you is Old Mushroom also known as Farting Fatty. He's a handsome and funny fellow, thanks to whom you'll learn that you can't keep a fart up your arse - he should be able to fly around the cottage!

Click, fart, have fun! Add the game now to your #wishlist on Steam - I'd be very grateful! 💚



👉 Meet the Moustached Pig! The hero you will unlock in A Story About Farting! Free the fart and unleash the mustachioed pig. Also meet the Drunken Cockroach and the Farting Cow! Discover all the characters in A Story About Farting - chart the achievements and your historic fart! 💨💨💨



What is A Story About Farting about?


A Story About Farting is an unusual, humorous and intriguing newcomer to the Steam platform. While the theme may seem unusual, the game offers many reasons to give it a chance.

  • Unique and funny subject matter - the theme of intestinal gas may seem absurd, but that is where the potential for fun lies. The developers have successfully treated it with humour, which makes the gameplay extremely funny and unusual. It will take you between 2 and 4 hours to complete the game, depending on your speed.
  • Variety and creativity - the game offers a wide variety of situations that are both surprising and full of creativity.
  • Humour for everyone - although the subject matter may not be for everyone, the game is designed in such a way that the humour within it is universal and can appeal to different age groups and preferences.
  • Uniqueness of experience - A Story About Farting is definitely a unique experience that deviates from standard games. It is a great option for people who are looking for something out of the ordinary and want to break away from typical themes or gameplay patterns.
  • Positive user feedback - the game has won praise from the gaming community, who appreciate its originality, creativity and humorous approach to the theme.
  • Ability to relax and have fun - despite its unusual theme, A Story About Farting is ideal for taking a break from reality and just having fun
.

All in all, a game with such an original theme as A Story About Farting on Steam is worth giving a chance. If you're looking for something out of the ordinary, humorous and a little bit crazy, this game will be a hit!

We'll be at any Steam Sale! Be ready, because our meme will soon be on sale! Want to find cool games on Steam? Make sure to check out A Story About Farting!

#clicker #indiegame #funny #memes #pointandclick #2D #comedic #singleplayer #cheapgame #idlegame #incrementalgames #horror #disgusting #astoryaboutfarting

highlighted.name: Does your old man know you're a devourer?
Burp and fart and then eat!

detailed_description:
Update Notes

A Story About Farting: Dive into the Stinkiest Update Yet! 🤮💨

Join us in A Story About Farting and experience our newest, disgustingly entertaining update! Play as Old Fatty, Fat Granny, or Mustachioed Pig and embark on the weirdest adventure of your life.

With 100 new achievements to unlock and even more intense farting sounds, there's no better time to immerse yourself in this world full of laughter and smelly surprises! Click now and join the stink-fueled fun! 🌬️💩


About the Game

Here is a game that will change the world of gaming! 💨💚

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: Whaaaatever bro dont worry about that
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: If u are rich - buy the best one
  • Memory: 2131256 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 99999999999999999999 MB available space

name: A Story About Farting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 9, 10 or 11
  • Processor: You'll even play it on a calculator XD
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Each one that works
  • Storage: 560 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Some may be useful
  • VR Support: Nope
  • Additional Notes: This is a beautiful and touching game. Have fun with it!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11 probably
  • Processor: The best you can get
  • Memory: 99999999999999999999 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The best you can get
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 99999999999999 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Better some than none
  • VR Support: No, but I wish you had such equipment. It's a cool thing

short_description: The most beautiful story in the world of games! 😂😂 An innovative clicker where you fart and burp your way through earning achievements! 👀 Visit Old Mushroom's hut, welcome Fatty and feed him until he explodes! Fart, burp and have a great time! 💨💚
